publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4406 Ms Sandra White: Sex Trafficking and the World Cup—That the Parliament deplores the active promotion of prostitution during the FIFA World Cup to be held in Germany; notes that Germany is the possible end destination of an estimated 40,000 trafficked victims; recognises that sex trafficking is often linked with organized crime, drugs and other illegal activities; demonstrates its commitment to abolishing this practice by encouraging Germany’s Chancellor, Angela Merkel, to initiate legislation targeted at those illegally trafficking women and children, and denounces this new form of slavery as demeaning and objectifying women, which should have no place in our modern world.

S2M-4406 Sex Trafficking and the World Cup (lodged on 16 May 2006) Shiona Baird*, Rob Gibson*, Rosie Kane*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Eleanor Scott*, Brian Adam*

S2M-4406 Ms Sandra White: Sex Trafficking and the World Cup—That the Parliament deplores the active promotion of prostitution during the FIFA World Cup to be held in Germany; notes that Germany is the possible end destination of an estimated 40,000 trafficked victims; recognises that sex trafficking is often linked with organized crime, drugs and other illegal activities; demonstrates its commitment to abolishing this practice by encouraging Germany’s Chancellor, Angela Merkel, to initiate legislation targeted at those illegally trafficking women and children, and denounces this new form of slavery as demeaning and objectifying women, which should have no place in our modern world. Supported by: Shiona Baird, Rob Gibson, Rosie Kane, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Eleanor Scott, Brian Adam, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4406 Sex Trafficking and the World Cup (lodged on 16 May 2006) Chris Ballance*
S2M-4406 Sex Trafficking and the World Cup (lodged on 16 May 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4406 Sex Trafficking and the World Cup (lodged on 16 May 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4406 Sex Trafficking and the World Cup (lodged on 16 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4406 Sex Trafficking and the World Cup (lodged on 16 May 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*
S2M-4406 Sex Trafficking and the World Cup (lodged on 16 May 2006) Carolyn Leckie*, Tommy Sheridan*
